name: Products Catalog
description: Syngenta-first chemical and fertilizer library with application rates and specifications.

prd.problemStatement: Superintendents need quick access to accurate product information including rates, mixing instructions, and application guidelines to create proper application plans.
goals: Include application rates and mixing instructions
Enable quick product search and filtering
userStories: As a superintendent, I want to search products quickly so that I can create application plans efficiently
As a superintendent, I want accurate rate information so that I apply products correctly
